messages.body: $AAPL I'm happy to ignore all analysts (proven time and time again to be wrong on AAPL), but, if I were to go with one, it'd be this guy.

links.title: Analyst: 'Massive iPhone upgrade opportunity on the horizon' | Philip Elmerâ€‘DeWitt
links.description: From a note to clients by GBH's Daniel Ives that landed in my inbox Tuesday: Taking a step back, we believe the Street is now starting to fully appreciate the massive iPhone upgrade opportunity on the horizon for the next 12 to 18 months with three new smart phones slated for release, likely in the September timeframe although we could see the SE 2 launched over the coming months.
